    APPEND_ITEM HDR_TIME_BASE 16 UINT "Time Base"

        READ_CONVERSION multi_string_tlm_item_conversion.rb "256 START 16 INT"
      ITEM ARG2_LENGTH 0 0 DERIVED "Length of String Arg"
        READ_CONVERSION multi_string_tlm_item_conversion.rb "256 START 16 INT 16 UINT"

        READ_CONVERSION multi_string_tlm_item_conversion.rb "256 START 16 INT 16 UINT 0 STRING"

        READ_CONVERSION multi_string_tlm_item_conversion.rb "256 START 16 INT 16 UINT 0 STRING 16 UINT"
      ITEM ARG3 0 0 DERIVED "Arg3"
        READ_CONVERSION multi_string_tlm_item_conversion.rb "256 START 16 INT 16 UINT 0 STRING 16 UINT 0 STRING"
      ITEM ARG4 0 0 DERIVED "Arg4"
        READ_CONVERSION multi_string_tlm_item_conversion.rb "256 START 16 INT 16 UINT 0 STRING 16 UINT 0 STRING 64 FLOAT"
